Articles.Content: I can't seem to find a way to change the number of mounting points for engine plates? Are they actually implemented yet and I'm missing something or are they just not functioning rn?
I don't know. I tried manually creating extra nodes using cubic trusses, but when I launch the craft all my engines collapse onto the runway.
You can just slap the typical symmetry on them, like surface attachment, there isn't any nodes except for the central one.
